content: LuckyFool / Caribbean Treasures 1g 999 Fine Silver MicroBitsLOT 1 - LuckyFool 1g 999 Silver / DIY  Btc Cold Storage MICROBITS Each LUCKYFOOL Silver DIY wallet comes with 2 security hologram stickers with laser etched serial number and a Certificate of AuthenticityLOT 2 - Caribbean Treasure 1g 999 Silver Physical BTC BAR / Funded with 7500 sats!  COST, PAYMENT, and SHIPPING INFOEach Lot has a different payment address LOT 1: LUCKYFOOL 1g SILVER ROUNDSThe SMALLEST Silver Physical BTC round in existence! Each silver coin is pressed with a polished die to give it a beautiful proof like finish with a clean, clear design! Each Roll or COIN comes with a custom COA! Don’t miss your chance to grab some while they last! EDIT: One Lucky (10) coin roll will come with a QR code funded with .001 btc so all 10 coins in the roll can be funded at their face value of .0001 btc!!!  MINTAGE : 250 (230 available)COST:-Rolls of 10 (sealed / in box with coa) - 120usd-Qty: 1-5 - 15usd ea. + shipping -Qty: 6-9 - 13usd ea. + shippingQty: 10+ - 12usd ea. + shippingSHIPPING:Inside US: $10 with trackingOutside US: $15 with tracking PAYMENT ADDRESS (btc) : bc1qp35dezzty3680llk4qlkysk3hskdu4je3zg5v8-Please send txid and shipping info once order is placed-Random Numbers will be assigned on a first come first serve basis. Will try to accommodate specific hologram serial numbers if available. -Rolls of 10 are sealed in heat shrink and will have (10) sequential hologram serial numbers. Some numbers may not be available outside of a roll. CONTACT ME FOR ANY QUESTIONS OR REQUEST!!LOT 2: CARIBBEAN TREASURES 999 Silver Bitcoin Bar / FUNDED w/ 7500 satsBeautiful 1g Physical Btc Silver Ingots funded and shipped with 7500 sats EACH! Worlds SMALLEST SILVER  BITCOIN BAR in a brilliant PROOF FINISH!!MINTAGE: 250 / 230 available COST: -30 each (includes funding and shipping inside US in price)-Bag of 10 (includes shipping and funding) - 260usdBTC PAYMENT ADDRESS: bc1qfsekuvkuzv84mpy7nqclpe8w50u84v08uezst5 Contact CARIBEAN TREASURES for any questions, comments, or concerns

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Said it before, gonna say it again, totally in love with these minimini collectibles - first of its size to be loaded afaik!Can't wait to see these bars IRL. I probably want some of the luckyfool coins, too. Will shoot you a pm soon.Great work guys and very cool colaboration. GG!

comments.author: tweetious
comments.created_time: July 13, 2023, 06:24:35 PMLast edit: July 13, 2023, 06:51:42 PM by tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: Bullion-n-BTC on July 13, 2023, 03:38:10 PMEach Roll or COIN comes with a custom COA! Each roll comes with 1 COA? If I order 9 coins, I will receive 9 COA (one for each coin) and if I place an order for 1 roll I will get 1 COA for the whole roll? Does the "LOT 2: CARIBBEAN TREASURES 999 Silver Bitcoin Bar / FUNDED w/ 7500 sats" come with a COA?How individual coins/bars (from lot 1 & lot 2) are packaged? Are those inside a plastic protective case/capsule? (to avoid possible tarnish during traveling - especially for long international distances..)If we place a combined order (with items from both lots) do we need to separately send payment for each lot? Where we should send the shipping fees?

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Good points by tweetious ↑These look great and very different, would you have an image of these MicroBits next to something else for scale reference?On the 7500 Sats Bar just after the date there seems to be the number 1 stamped and anumber 1 with the hologram is there anymore info regarding this?

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on July 13, 2023, 06:24:35 PMQuote from: Bullion-n-BTC on July 13, 2023, 03:38:10 PMEach Roll or COIN comes with a custom COA! Each roll comes with 1 COA? If I order 9 coins, I will receive 9 COA (one for each coin) and if I place an order for 1 roll I will get 1 COA for the whole roll? Does the "LOT 2: CARIBBEAN TREASURES 999 Silver Bitcoin Bar / FUNDED w/ 7500 sats" come with a COA?How individual coins/bars (from lot 1 & lot 2) are packaged? Are those inside a plastic protective case/capsule? (to avoid possible tarnish during traveling - especially for long international distances..)If we place a combined order (with items from both lots) do we need to separately send payment for each lot? Where we should send the shipping fees?I can only speak for the LuckyFool rounds but a Roll will come with a COA stating it’s a sealed roll of (10) and which serial numbers are in that roll.  Singles will come with their own coa each. Rolls will come in a small jewelers style boy while singles will come in a small protective bag and inside of a sealed black envelope. As stated in post there are two payment addresses, 1 for each lot and both addresses are listed with said respective lots.

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: 1 randomly selected LUCKYFOOL coin roll will come with a QR code key set that is funded with .001 btc so the owner can fund all 10 coins in the roll at face value of .0001 btc each! Must buy roll of 10 or more to have a chance!

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: I like the lucky roll. Good touch to fit with the theme of your creations. These look great.

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on July 13, 2023, 06:24:35 PMQuote from: Bullion-n-BTC on July 13, 2023, 03:38:10 PMEach Roll or COIN comes with a custom COA! Each roll comes with 1 COA? If I order 9 coins, I will receive 9 COA (one for each coin) and if I place an order for 1 roll I will get 1 COA for the whole roll? Does the "LOT 2: CARIBBEAN TREASURES 999 Silver Bitcoin Bar / FUNDED w/ 7500 sats" come with a COA?How individual coins/bars (from lot 1 & lot 2) are packaged? Are those inside a plastic protective case/capsule? (to avoid possible tarnish during traveling - especially for long international distances..)If we place a combined order (with items from both lots) do we need to separately send payment for each lot? Where we should send the shipping fees? Each piece will be capsuled. Each piece comes with a public key, so you can verify. No COA .

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on July 13, 2023, 06:32:43 PMGood points by tweetious ↑These look great and very different, would you have an image of these MicroBits next to something else for scale reference?On the 7500 Sats Bar just after the date there seems to be the number 1 stamped and anumber 1 with the hologram is there anymore info regarding this?All Caribbean Treasures pieces are stamped to represent the first pieces. These bars are small so only the first 10 will be hand stamped. Mintage of 250. I typically keep them or give them to friends or sell at a premium. The bar is 1 gram in silver weight ,next to a standard size copper 1 oz bar. The holo looks as if it is raining bitcoins into a pile of Caribbean Treasures.
